title: Fiskars 194220 Back to School Supplies, Kids Scissors Softgrip Blunt-tip, 5 Inch, Color Received May Vary
description: Fiskars Softgrip Blunt-tip Kids Scissors are loved by kids for their bright, fun and comfortable design and by teachers and parents for their safety. The Softgrip handle improves comfort, while a creative, colorful design makes cutting fun. A larger finger loop and an ergonomic thumb loop also provide a natural, more comfortable fit for kids fingers. Like all Fiskars Kids Scissors, Softgrip Blunt-tip Kids Scissors feature innovative safety-edge blades for high-quality cutting with a safer blade angle.
